Name: Trash is Fun
About the game: Embark on an unforgettable journey with your friends around the world in an eco-friendly adventure made specifically for a group of 2 to 4 people. You will play as different mutated animals: duck, owl, squirrel and hedgehog, and others. After the apocalypse due to global warming, the characters realized that in order to survive, they would have to gather in a team and sort and recycle garbage. Features: Co-op: play with friends from 1 device (local co-op), or go on an exciting adventure through Remote Play (online co-op). Trash-Zombies: You waiting for the revived garbage? And he came. Due to mutations, the garbage came to life and destroys all the sorting stations around the world. to protect against it, you have turrets, and on each hero a flamethrower. Survival: at the levels, to protect against zombies, there are barricades that are destructible. There is also an electricity generator, and an oxygen filter, which has its own hp. Garbage sorting: the first computer game on the market about cooperative sorting garbage, you have to live the unusual day of an unusual sorter. You will recycle paper, plastic, and other garbage. ​ Our team:​ Martian Teapots​ is a teenage game development studio.​ It was founded in 2017 in Sumy, Ukraine and operates based on Sumy State University. VP Production​ is an independent audio agency that creates sonic identities for games, brands, and apps. It was founded in 2016 in Odesa, Ukraine. Since then, the whole team has been working remotely from different Ukrainian cities and other countries, cooperating with clients worldwide.
